main event: A dark bullet-shaped object with a red glow in front and a white trail was observed in Cincinnati, Ohio on September 7, 1951.
interesting points: The object was reported to be about the size of a B-29 and was flying at an altitude of 20,000 feet., The observation lasted for 10 seconds., The object disappeared behind the mountains to the north., The sighting was classified as a meteor after evaluation., There was no conclusive evidence from the weather forecaster's information.
sighted object: dark bullet-shaped object with a red glow
